description: Atlanta United’s welcome to Major League Soccer ended with a loss Sunday, a 2-1 defeat against the New York Red Bulls at Georgia Tech’s Bobby Dodd Stadium.
title: Game recap, photos, videos,
title_page: Atlanta United FC vs. New York Red Bulls: Game recap, photos, videos,
text:
Atlanta United’s welcome to Major League Soccer ended with a loss Sunday, a 2-1 defeat against the New York Red Bulls at Georgia Tech’s Bobby Dodd Stadium.
Here’s what you should know about the first game in Atlanta United franchise history:
> 5 observations: Important takeaways from the game
> Mark Bradley: Rousing debut for city’s team of the future
> Trivia answer: Who scored the first goal for Atlanta United?
> Photos: Historic day for Atlanta United
> Videos: Doug Roberson’s look at Atlanta United
> More: Complete coverage of Atlanta United
